languages.text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать о ксеносах данной породы — сслитах. Эти существа часто встречаются в свите могучих владык друкари как телохранители и чемпионы. Они столь же развращены и злобны, как и их хозяева, но обладают более примитивным разумом и ведомы более низменными потребностями.{/n}

{n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вам доводилось слышать о ксеносах данной породы — сслитах. Эти существа часто встречаются в свите могучих владык друкари как телохранители и чемпионы. Они столь же развращены и злобны, как и их хозяева, но обладают более примитивным разумом и ведомы более низменными потребностями.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You have heard of non-humans of this breed — the Sslyth. These creatures are often seen present among the entourage of powerful Drukhari lords as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

{n}You have heard of non-humans of this breed — the Sslyth. These creatures are often seen present among the entourage of powerful Drukhari lords as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

{n}You have heard of this breed of non-humans — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

{n}You have heard of this breed of non-humans — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

{n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你听说过这种异形，他们叫“蛇人”，常常会与强大的黑暗灵族领主随行，充当保镖与战士的角色。他们与他们的主人同样恶毒、同样残忍，但他们的智力较为原始，会受较为低级的需求所驱使。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你听说过这种异形，他们叫“西里斯”，常常会与强大的黑暗灵族领主随行，充当保镖与战士的角色。他们与他们的主人同样恶毒、同样残忍，但他们的智力较为原始，会受较为低级的需求所驱使。{/n}

languages.text: {n}この異種族のことは聞いたことがある――ススリスと呼ばれるこの生命体は、デュカーリの有力な領主の側近として見られ、ボディーガードや戦士の役割を果たすことが多い。主と同じくらい下劣で残虐だが、彼らの知性はより原始的で、より卑しい欲求に突き動かされている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}この異種族のことは聞いたことがある――ススリスと呼ばれるこの生命体は、デュカーリの有力な領主の側近として見られ、ボディーガードや戦士の役割を果たすことが多い。主と同じくらい下劣で残虐だが、彼らの知性はより原始的で、より卑しい欲求に突き動かされている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Has oído hablar de esta raza de xenos: los Sslyth. Estas criaturas suelen formar parte del séquito de señores Drukhari poderosos para actuar como guardaespaldas y campeones. Son tan depravados y sádicos como sus amos, pero su intelecto es más primitivo y les mueven impulsos más básicos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Has oído hablar de esta raza de xenos: los Sslyth. Estas criaturas suelen formar parte del séquito de señores Drukhari poderosos para actuar como guardaespaldas y campeones. Son tan depravados y sádicos como sus amos, pero su intelecto es más primitivo y les mueven impulsos más básicos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous avez déjà entendu parler de cette espèce de xénos, appelée Sslyth. Bon nombre des seigneurs drukharis les plus puissants les recrutent comme gardes du corps et champions. Ils sont tout aussi dépravés et malfaisants que leurs maîtres, mais leur intellect est plus primitif et ils se contentent généralement d'assouvir leurs instincts les plus primaires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez déjà entendu parler de cette espèce de xénos, appelée Sslyth. Bon nombre des seigneurs drukharis les plus puissants les recrutent comme gardes du corps et champions. Ils sont tout aussi dépravés et malfaisants que leurs maîtres, mais leur intellect est plus primitif et ils se contentent généralement d'assouvir leurs instincts les plus primaires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast von dieser Art Xenos schon gehört – die Sslyth. Man findet diese Kreaturen häufig im Gefolge mächtiger Drukhari-Lords, wo sie als Leibwächter und Kämpfer fungieren. Sie sind ebenso verderbt und bösartig wie ihre Meister, aber ihr Intellekt ist primitiver, und ihr Antrieb beschränkt sich auf Grundbedürfnisse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast von dieser Art Xenos schon gehört – die Sslyth. Man findet diese Kreaturen häufig im Gefolge mächtiger Drukhari-Lords, wo sie als Leibwächter und Kämpfer fungieren. Sie sind ebenso verderbt und bösartig wie ihre Meister, aber ihr Intellekt ist primitiver, und ihr Antrieb beschränkt sich auf Grundbedürfnisse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zenoların bu türüne Sslyth dendiğini biliyorsun. En kudretli Drukhari lordlarının maiyetlerinde hizmet eden bu zenolar, koruma ve müdafaa vazifelerinde kullanılır. Akılları daha ilkel, nefisleri daha sefil olsa da en az efendileri kadar yozlaşmış ve habistirler.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You have heard of this breed of xenos — the Sslyth. These creatures can often be found in the entourages of powerful Drukhari lords, where they serve as bodyguards and champions. They are just as depraved and vicious as their masters, but theirs is a more primitive intellect and they are driven by baser needs.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Zenoların bu türüne Sslyth dendiğini biliyorsun. En kudretli Drukhari lordlarının maiyetlerinde hizmet eden bu zenolar, koruma ve müdafaa vazifelerinde kullanılır. Akılları daha ilkel, nefisleri daha sefil olsa da en az efendileri kadar yozlaşmış ve habistirler.{/n}
